products.name: Purified Drinking Water
products.facts: ["The bottle is typically made from PET plastic, which is recyclable.","Purified drinking water undergoes a filtration process to remove impurities and contaminants.","Many brands use eco-friendly practices in sourcing and bottling water to minimize environmental impact.","Purified water is often tested for quality and safety to meet regulatory standards before being bottled."]

products.name: Extra virgin olive oil
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Fats, Vegetable fats, Olive tree products, Vegetable oils, Olive oils, Extra-virgin olive oils, Virgin olive oils
products.facts: ["Extra virgin olive oil is made from pure, cold-pressed olives without any chemical treatment.","It is often produced using sustainable farming practices that promote biodiversity and reduce environmental impact.","High-quality extra virgin olive oil has a low acidity level, typically below 0.8%, indicating superior quality and freshness.","The oil is rich in antioxidants and healthy monounsaturated fats, contributing to heart health and overall wellness."]
